drupalNodeEvent.title: The Biden Administration's Approach to Asia and Views on Taiwan

field_speakers.processed: Derek Grossman (RAND Corp), Barbara Weisel (Rock Creek Global Advisors), Robert Sutter (George Washington University), Deepa Ollapally (George Washington University)

field_description.processed: The Biden administration is well on its way to making a mark in Asia with a more wide-ranging and active foreign policy agenda and engagement than most observers expected. What have we learned in the first 100 days about how the Biden team views Taiwan strategically and economically? What are the prospects of cooperation bilaterally and multilaterally?
